name: teams-list-shared-channels
title: Teams List Shared Channels & External-Tenant Detector
shortDescription: This script lists all shared channels across Teams, identifies external tenant connections, and generates a detailed report.
longDescription: This script enumerates all shared channels across Microsoft Teams in your tenant, detects external tenant connections, and generates a comprehensive report. It leverages Microsoft Graph PowerShell and Teams cmdlets to provide detailed insights into channel sharing and external collaboration.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Shared-Channels inventory & external-tenant detector

references.name: Want to learn more about Microsoft Graph PowerShell SDK and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the Microsoft Graph PowerShell SDK documentation site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
